definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Je 50:39 a wild beast, prop. either desert-dweller (denom. from [[חִיׇּה]], so most), or crier, yelper (√ …[[חוה]] = d.wy [yelp, Dozy], Ba:NB 188, cf. Ew:§ 146 g, note);—in any case a specif. animal, but not certainly identif.; Bo:Hieroz. i, lib. 3, § 14, cp. Ar. d.aywanun wild cat;—pl. [[חִיִּים]] Is 13:21 (f. [[אִיִּים]] v:Is 13:22), Is 23:13, Is 34:14 (+ [[אִיִּים]]), Je 50:39 (id.; all betokening desolation); ´[[לְעַם לְח]] Ps 74:14 (rd. ´[[לְעַם ח]] Hup-Now Bae); appar. of people Ps 72:9, but prob. corrupt, Ol conj. [[חָרִים]] (‖[[אׂיְבָיו]]), and so most moderns.
